info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 4:09PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN PORTAGE...SOUTHERN GEAUGA AND NORTHERN SUMMIT COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EST... At 408 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cuyahoga Falls, or 8 miles north of Akron, moving northeast at 45 mph. Another stronger storm was located over Macedonia, also moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Cuyahoga Falls, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Macedonia, South Russell, Middlefield, Garrettsville, Burton, Mantua, Stow, Aurora, Brecksville, Fairlawn, Parkman, Richfield, Huntsburg, and Reminderville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
